attributes.additional_details:
Dear Reader,

It is my belief that we need to do more to protect the hard working, law abiding citizens of this nation.

This petition is to ask the government to pass a new and simple law.

The law: if you have a criminal record, you will not be able to recieve any form of benefit.

It would be unfair to backdate any punishment for previous crimes, therefore this law applies to any crimes committed on or after the day this law is passed.

Please sign this petition and play a part in improving our slowly decaying society.

Thank you.
